title: what happens to your current blue essence
body: I've heard that it gets multiplied by 6.5 is that true please let me know if i should use my worlds tokens to buy more blue essence so i have more in the long run

replies.body: When the switch happens, your current BE is indeed multiplied by 6.5 and then added to your IP total for your new grand total moving forward ^_^!
